body_html: All these tests use SpatialConvolutionMM from THNN. Does test_torch.py pass? Maybe it's a bug in THVector_(fill) (used here)? That seems to be the only architecture specific part there.
body_text: All these tests use SpatialConvolutionMM from THNN. Does test_torch.py pass? Maybe it's a bug in THVector_(fill) (used here)? That seems to be the only architecture specific part there.
body: All these tests use `SpatialConvolutionMM` from [THNN](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/THNN/generic/SpatialConvolutionMM.c). Does `test_torch.py` pass? Maybe it's a bug in `THVector_(fill)` (used [here](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/THNN/generic/SpatialConvolutionMM.c#L100-L102))? That seems to be the only architecture specific part there.
